name: From Beyond (matsuringo)
description:
-----

You don't know where you are.

You don't know how you got here.

All you know is you must return.

From beyond...

ControlsKeysMovementW, A, S, D
SprintShift (Hold)
StrafeAlt (Hold)
First Person View
Right Click (Hold)
Fire Weapon
Left Click (While strafing/aiming)
Open Inventory
RSwitch Active Hand*
QPause Menu
Esc

* This is the hand that will place items into (or take them from) slots in your inventory.

-----

This is a prototype for a survival horror game.
The main feature is the inventory system, so everything else is unpolished!
Please enjoy exploring this glorified testing arena.

(The objective is to collect four golden skulls, place them in the holder by the portal, and escape!)
